_description: A prayer for grace by the wounds of Christ — four quatrains

PlimptonAd2.First Lines:
Almytty god Iehsu crist þat deydest upon de rode treI
                    bete I bound wiþ spere & hong wiþ nayl & th[ ] for
                    me…
PlimptonAd2.Last Lines:
…Holde þe good ben in þi loreAmende þe wycked
                    of her syne
PlimptonAd2.Editions:
Acker,  Paul. 
             “An Unedited Middle English Religious Lyric (IMEVS 250.3) in Plimpton MS
                Add. 2.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n. s. 46 (1999): 12.
